item.title: 🖱 Devices Attached
item.description: Windows Are we looking for USB storage media activity or all USB devices? Like, cameras 📸?

item.title: ShellBag
item.description: Key 🔑 : UsrClass\Local Settings\Software\Microsoft\Windows\Shell\BagMRU . Values: MRUListEx, NodeSlot, Subkeys. Key 🔑 : UsrClass\Local Settings\Software\Microsoft\Windows\Shell\Bags. Values: Shell, will have folder’s GUID.

item.title: ⚙️ Windows Registry
item.description: Hives: C:\Documents and Settings |*\ntuser.dat C:\Users\ |*\ ntuser. dat C: \Users\ \*\ntuser.dat. LOG|* C: \ Users\ |*\ AppData\Local\Microsoft\Windows| UsrClass.
